com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.block
Class BlockId

java.lang.Object
  com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.block.BlockId

public class BlockId
extends java.lang.Object

A utility class to represent a block type along with optional data.

Author:
nitnelave

Constructor Summary

          Get the id and data from a block.

Constructor Detail

BlockId

public BlockId(int id)
Only id is specified, data comparison accepts any value.

Parameters:
id - The block id.

BlockId

public BlockId(int id,
               byte data)
Id and data are specified. If data == -1, then it is considered as unspecified.

Parameters:
id - The block id.
data - The block data.

BlockId

public BlockId(int id,
               byte data,
               boolean hasData)
Id and data are specified, and hasData specifies if the data is used.

Parameters:
id - The block id.
data - The block data.
hasData - Whether the data should be used in comparing.

BlockId

public BlockId(java.lang.String str)
        throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
Constructor from string. The string is parsed in an attempt to get the info. The string format accepted is a simple number for just the id, or id:data for both.

Parameters:
str - The string to be parsed.
Throws:
java.lang.NumberFormatException - If the string does not match any pattern.
